1090.issue: [E1090] admin dependency missing. admin 6.17.14 is required as minimum, 7.6.17 is recommended. Please add to globalDependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.opcua/blob/master/io-package.json).

4036.issue: [S4036] Consider adding .vscode/settings.json file with JSON schema definitions for better development experience with Visual Studio Code.
